Class Choice.Condition<P>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.team33.libs.decision.v1.Choice.Condition<P>
  • Enclosing class:
    Choice<P,R>

    public static class Choice.Condition<P>
extends Object
    Represents the start of the creation of a Choice on a given condition.
